text: ye vah bakhshis hai jo kabhee manaqata (khatm) na hogee to ye log (khuda ke alaava) jisakee parasatish karate hain tum usase shaq mein na padana ye log to bas vaisee ibaadat karate hain jaisee unase pahale unake baap daada karate the aur ham zarur (qayaamat ke din) unako (azaab ka) poora poora hissa bagair kam kie degen
